pageTitle: Candice R. Montzingo, M.D. - Anesthesiology , , Anesthesiology
textBeforeTable: Board Certification and Academic Information Dr. Montzingo is an anesthesiologist focusing on the use of perioperative echocardiography to diagnose and guide the management of cardiovascular disease. Bio Anesthesiology Specialties Clinical Details English Languages Anesthesiology Specialties ? No Rating Available Patient Rating: Candice R. Montzingo, M.D. ? textAfterTable: Prior to coming to Utah, Dr. Montzingo practiced Anesthesiology at The Nebraska Medical Center where she was integral in developing a team of physicians trained in perioperative echocardiography. She was an instructor for the National Academy of Perioperative Echocardiography; an executive medical fellowship program teaching physicians from other institutions in the United States perioperative transthoracic and transesophageal echocardiography. Dr. Montzingo is a Fellow of the American Society of Echocardiography and is actively involved in the Society of Cardiovascular Anesthesiologists.
